pages.text: $(li)Glass Bottles are basically containers.$(br)$(li)You can fill Glass Bottles with Honey, Water, Lava, and Ink.

$(li)To use a Glass Bottle, just right click pointing the specific liquid while you are holding a Glass Bottle on your hand.$(br)$(li)Depending of the liquid, you will obtain a Water Bottle, Lava Bottle, Honey Bottle, or Ink Bottle.
$(li)You can trap Bees with a Glass Bottle.$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are pointing one of these creatures and you are holding a Glass Bottle on your hand.
$(li)You can trap Silverfish with a Glass Bottle.$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are pointing one of these creatures and you are holding a Glass Bottle on your hand.
$(li)You can trap Endermite with a Glass Bottle.$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are pointing one of these creatures and you are holding a Glass Bottle on your hand.
